    • Method Detail

      • getState

        public Storage.State getState()
        Specified by:
        getState in interface Storage
        Returns:
        whether this Storage is currently loading, unloading or doing nothing (standby). The State changes over time, for instance, when a loading Storage reaches its maximum load capacity, it goes to Standby mode.

      • getLoad

        public float getLoad()
        Specified by:
        getLoad in interface Storage
        Returns:
        amount of electrical energy currently stored, in Watt.hour.

      • getLoadCapacity

        Specified by:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • update

        public void update()
        Implements the electrical behaviour of this battery. Consumes MAX_IN Watts when it is loading, produces MAX_OUT Watts when it is unloading, ensures that the maximum loading capacity is respected.
        Specified by:
        update in interface fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.environment.Updatable

      • blackout

        public void blackout()
        Description copied from interface: Prosumer
        When the electrical networks shuts down, every connected prosumer endures a blackout.
